name: Job and Esther Technologies
tag_list: cross-platform-development, cross-device-integration, mobile, desktop, embedded, server, html5
overview:
Job and Esther Technologies is a software engineering company that exists to solve app development fragmentation, technology lock-in, and software incompatibility with modern-day solutions.

Led by Markku Kero, the company developed the Eqela software platform, which allows app developers to use one codebase and compile it as a 100% native app for each of their target platform or operating system.

The Eqela platform is a key component in the creation of a complete operating system called Igelle which runs on mobile, desktop, embedded devices and server systems.

Job and Esther Technologies licenses its software products and offers professional services such as trainings and custom development to customers worldwide.
